item.title: About
item.description: If you focus on what you left behind, you will never be able to see what lies ahead. This site Why blogging? It’s cool. It’s personalized. To accumulate a sense of achievement. This site is powered by Hugo with default markup set as Pandoc, deployed on a Huawei cloud server, and supported by Upyun CDN. Part of the layout and CSS style use xmin, \(\LaTeX\).css, and MemE as references.

item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Personal Information Name: CHEN, Hua (陈华) Email: huachen@mails.ccnu.edu.cn Homepage: https://ichenh.com/ ORCID iD: 0000-0001-9669-1683 Research Interests Modified Gravity; Dark Energy; Dark Matter Education Background 2017 ~ 2020, Master of Science, College of Physical Science and Technology, Central China Normal University. 2012 ~ 2016, Bachelor of Science, College of Physical Science and Technology, Central China Normal University. Publications Please check inSPIRE for more details. Published H. Chen, T. Katsuragawa,

item.title: 关于
item.description: 莫听穿林打叶声，何妨吟啸且徐行。竹杖芒鞋轻胜马，谁怕？一蓑烟雨任平生。料峭春风吹酒醒，微冷，山头斜照却相迎。回首向来萧瑟处，归去，也无风雨也

item.title: 简历
item.description: 个人信息 姓名：陈华 邮箱：huachen@mails.ccnu.edu.cn 网站：https://ichenh.com/ 研究兴趣 修改引力；暗物
